The new killer is extremely overpowered, the games now are never fair anymore thanks to her. She has the ability to teleport through tv's and to even be invincible for a limited time, if you are reading this developers, please fix the imbalance.

Dead By Daylight is some of the most fun you can have ONLY when you play custom games where you have all the perks unlocked and maxed out. If you don't then you are stuck with a game that has a grind that would be bad even for free to play games and developers that seem to not add quality of life changes simply to spite the community. This alienation has no signs of changing.

When you first play you will quickly notice that the upgrade system forces you to grind for meta perks and is so long that by the time you get to the point you can experiment with builds you are burning out, As of typing this I have 300hrs and I just barely finished UNLOCKING THE ABILITY TO START UNLOCKING THE META PERKS. This (placeholder) upgrade system has been in place since 2016 and will probably never change because the developers already have all the perks unlocked so they just don't care (BHVR actually said that). 

To sum it up, Dead by Daylight is beautiful on paper but somewhere along the line BHVR realized that it's just easier to shell out DLC then make you grind to unlock the DLC you already paid for then actually improve the game. I can only hope that someone will come along and give DBD the competition it needs but with BHVRs Narcissus complex they will most likely continue to release licensed killers and cosmetics to squeeze the last few drops of blood from horror fans while their community leaves this toxic relationship. If VHS is out then just play that or try GTFO.
this is a really  good game you can play as suviors are friends which is the best and meme which is what i do most of the time because its what makes the game fun and yea its a fun game
Fuck your terms of service, garbage game anyways

I think they did a pretty good...job so far.
For survivor.
just made the switch from console, have around 400 hours there. Would recommend, lots of fun.
I play For Honor until I get mad and switch over to DbD..... With the stress I put on my heart I won't live past 30
i love this game, its so fun
its horror but not to scary that you get nervous but it gives the perfect adrenaline rush

Tbh when I was first playing this game i was like "This is boring,this game sucks"But the more I played and the more perks I unlocked, The game was starting to get more fun playing killer or survivor. Its just grinding that is the boring part, but the more you grind the more you will find this game fun.You unlock killers by buying them with money or just grinding! it might take a while to get a killer but it will all be worth it at the end. This game does have it's ups and downs you will experience toxic people tea bagging,flash light clicking,pointing,And even leaving a toxic comment at the end of the game.. that is ofc if you are playing killer, even with killer there is a lot of toxic people they will slug,tunnel,and run the most toxic perks they can then probably call you crash. But tbh even with the game having a lot of toxic people, having to grind blood points or shards.The game is really fun regardless and recommend buying at least 1 of the many packs Dead by Daylight has to offer if you are getting this game!

La verdad no me esperaba tanto del juego, me lo instale un dia que un amigo me dijo que lo canjeara por la plataforma prohibida [Juegos Epicos]. 

Esperaba un juego aburrido y nada divertido, me la paso jugando hasta solo de lo divertido que se me hizo el juego.

Me encanta el ambiente thriller, con diferentes personajes tipicos de ficcion.
- Freddy Krueger (La pesadilla)
- Michael Myers (La forma)
- Leatherface (El canibal)
-  Ghost Face

El trabajo de tener que reparar motores para poder abrir la puerta y realizar el escape. Al momento de hacerlo sentis esos nervios, suspenso, mirando para todos lados en busca del asesino.

La cooperaciÃ³n de las personas es buenisimo, se toman el juego enserio y para nada trolls, puede ser que te toque gente que crea que sea chistosa pero bueno. Los de PC como los de Play son bastante buenos, nada para decir sobre ellos de forma negativa.

Y demas personajes que como esos llevan otros nombres, la verdad no entiendo bien la razon pero bueno.
La verdad se los recomiendo mucho, excelente para jugar con amigos y hasta solo.
Microtransacciones conectadas con steam, nada de paginas externas de Dead By Daylight.

Espero les haya gustado mi reseÃ±a sobre este juego, los invito a darle me gusta y pasarse por los comentarios de mi perfil.
